title: Brazil and Peru produce coffee and wheat

content.prompt:
Brazil and Peru produce both coffee and wheat using labor as the only input. The table below shows the labor hours required to produce a unit of coffee and a unit of wheat in each country.

 

Based on the information in the table above, which of the following is true?

choices.label: Peru has a comparative advantage in producing wheat.
Peru has an absolute advantage in producing wheat.
Brazil has an absolute advantage in producing wheat.
Peru has a comparative advantage in producing coffee.
Brazil has a comparative advantage in producing coffee.

topic.text: 1.3: Comparative Advantage and Gains from Trade
